description: Elevate your humble chicken schnitzel to a gloriously cheesy chicken parmigiana. It will soon become a household favourite.
name: Easy Cheesy Chicken Parmigiana Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g rspca chicken herb & garlic schnitzels
500 g Leggo's Parmigiana sauce with tomato

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place broccoli and cauliflower in a steamer set over a saucepan of boiling water. Steam for 3 minutes or until just tender. Serve parmigiana with steamed vegetables.
